title: Productivity primer
creator_credit: Biographic Cartoon Films and Bob Godfrey
brief_description: A consideration of two issues - what is productivity and why does it matter. To employ more married women, postpone retirement, bring in immigrant workers are some suggested ways of increasing Britain’s output.
